main.name: Sokheng Teang
main.description: I am an ambitious Software Engineer with a passion for developing innovative applications. I have a robust academic background and will graduate with an associate degree from Riverside City College in Mathematic and Behavioral Scince. I also have experience working in programming from completing a coding booth camp from Flatiron. I am eager to use my skills to develop cutting-edge software solutions
main.bio: Full-stack Software Engineer eager to contribute to team success through hard work, attention to detail, and strong communication skills. Training in (Ruby on Rails, React, and JavaScript). Developing a growth mindset as I learn, grow, and succeed in technology. I'm looking for a firm that recognizes my tenacity and ability to learn. Aside from programming, I also enjoy going for walks on the beach. I find that it's a great way to clear my head and relax. I also enjoy hiking and making food. I find both of these activities to be fun and rewarding.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Well rounded student with great organizational and communication skill, and the most useful skills I have acquired at college is problem solving skill.
Valued and supportive tech community, Javascript, React, and Ruby on Rails, and the most useful skills I have acquired are working independently and asking for help .

work.title: Math Tutor
work.description: Gave in-person instruction to math and physics students to help them acquire greater knowledge for weekly exam and assisted in assembling lesson plans keep them on track with assignments.

projects.title: Are-You-Smarter-Than-A-Flatiron-Student
projects.category: A public quiz website for users to pick the number of quiz questions they take and see how much money they earn when they get the correct answer and lose money if they choose the wrong answer.
